In order to contain the spread of Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19), some precautionary
measures are required to be taken by all the employees and the Ministries / Departments. In
this regard, Ministry of Personnel, Public Grievances and Pensions (Department of Personnel
and Training) has issued advisory for the well-being of Government employees and in public
interest. The copy of the same is enclosed herewith as per Appendix- 'A' for strict
compliance.
2. 
Hand sanitizers should be kept mandatorily at the entry of all offices. Entry of visitors
in the office complexes should be discouraged. Non-essential official tours should be avoided.
Delivery and receipt of dak should be facilitated at the entry point itself of the offices. Work-
place, particularly frequently touched surfaces should be cleaned and sanitized properly on
regular intervals.
3. 
The leave sanctioning authorities are also advised to sanction leave whenever any
request is made for self-quarantine as a precautionary measure. All employees who are at
higher risk i.e. older employees, pregnant employees and employees who have underlying
medical conditions may be advised to take extra precautions.
4. 
All Sainik Sammelans and regimental activities should be cancelled atleast upto 31$
March2020.
5. 
Further, this HQ has already issued some'Dos and Don'ts' for sensitizing the ASG
personnel vide AS Circular No. 0312020 dated 06.03.2020 and instructions for 'Home
Quarantine'vide AS Circular No. 04/2020 dated 17.03.2020 to prevent Coronavirus infection.
6. 
All CASOs are hereby directed to sensitize all the ASG personnel adequately and brief
them to follow the above instructions meticulously to prevent Coronavirus infection.
7. 
IG/APS-I & II, all DIsG/AP and DIG/SSG will ensure meticulous implementation of
above directions at the ASGs under their respective jurisdiction.
